trans-unit.source: Enumerates the values of <xref uid="langword_csharp_EmphasisWord" name="EmphasisWord" href=""></xref> for a specific <xref uid="langword_csharp_TextFragment" name="TextFragment" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 枚举的值<xref uid="langword_csharp_EmphasisWord" name="EmphasisWord" href=""></xref>特定<xref uid="langword_csharp_TextFragment" name="TextFragment" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The word emphasis is set for <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances through the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> object returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property on an instance of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.
trans-unit.target: 为<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>实例通过<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A>上<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>按<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A><xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>实例上的属性</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A>返回的对象</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>的属性</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A></xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>设置 word 强调

trans-unit.source: Each synthetic speech engine is free to determine how to render emphasis; the nature of emphasis differs between languages, dialects, genders, or voices.
trans-unit.target: 每个合成语音引擎可以自由地决定如何呈现强调;语言、 方言、 性别或语音之间不同的强调的性质。

trans-unit.source: Both EmphasisWord and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak> may be used when setting or getting the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> on a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> instance.
trans-unit.target: 这两个 EmphasisWord 和<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak>时设置或获取可能使用<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A>上<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>实例。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak>

trans-unit.source: The two values may be distinguished by the fact that the actual values of EmphasisWord are greater than or equal to zero, and the values of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak> are all less than zero; and by using the value of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> object returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property on an instance.
trans-unit.target: 两个值都可能通过 EmphasisWord 的实际值是大于或等于零，事实数据表和的值进行区分<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak>是所有小于零; 且使用的值<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction>返回<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A>属性<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>返回对象<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A>实例上的属性。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak>

trans-unit.source: Indicates an engine-specific default level of emphasis.
trans-unit.target: 指示强调引擎特定的默认级别。
